core:messageResource.core:message: Day End
Are you sure you wish to run day end for the store?
Store day end has been started successfully.
Failed to run store day end
Day end has already been run. Do you wish to re-run it?
Day end is already running.
Are you sure you wish to run day end for this terminal?
Day end for this terminal completed.
Its too early to run POS Day End, please try again later.
Day end cancelled. Re-run of day end is required.
Day end failed. Please resolve the problem and re-run day end.
Failed to initiate the delete stored transactions process.
Failed to initiate the delete stored transactions process. Press OK to continue with day end or press Cancel to exit day end.
Failed to list the stored transactions.
Failed to list the stored transactions. Press OK to continue with day end or press Cancel to exit day end.
Failed to delete a stored transaction.
Failed to delete a stored transaction. Press OK to continue with day end or press Cancel to exit day end.
Press OK to continue with day end or press Cancel to exit day end.
There are one or more not voidable stored transactions.
There are one or more not voidable stored transactions. Press OK to continue with day end or press Cancel to exit day end.
There are no stored transactions.
Job created to delete {deletePendingCount} stored transactions.
Run
The user can run Day End
Authorise
The user can authorise Day End
Run Day End before Earliest POS Day End Time
The user can run POS Day End before the earliest POS Day End time
Authorise run POS Day End before Earliest POS Day End Time
The user can authorise the running of POS Day End before the earliest POS Day End time
Allow Continue with POS Day End on Failed Delete Stored Transactions
The user can continue with POS Day End when delete stored transactions failed
Allow Continue with POS Day End on Not Voidable Stored Transaction.
The user can continue with POS Day End when there not not voidable stored stored transactions
